title: Laborer, Nicaragua
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Inscription on back, in pencil: [21 f11  18M] and [Laborer, Ni
description: group of boys: boy in foreground seated on a modified bicycle (back half only) with his proper right foot on the \"handlebars\"/fence; another boy, seated on a cart, leaning over with his hands on the front wheels; other boys in background
creditline: Gift of Jack and Kay Dunne
